page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {EMPLOYMENT IN GUERNSEY { { }The States of Guernsey are probably the single largest employer of labour. Tourism, banking and horticulture account for a large proportion of the islands employment. The banking and tourism centres are situated in St Peter Port. Horticulture occurs throughout the island with the exception of St.Peter Port. Shops in St Peter Port employ a significant number of people. Many school children get part-time jobs in small gift shops and in greenhouse to earn some extra pocket money.
